hymn.title: The heavier the cross, the nearer God
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—Gain by Loss

creators.author: Benjamin Schmolk
Translated by J. D. Burns and adapted

layout.singingstanza: The heav -- ier the cross, the near -- er God; No cross with -- out, no God with -- in! The prince of dark -- ness thus is trod, A -- mid the world's false glare and din. Oh, hap -- py he, with all his loss, Whom God hath set be -- neath the cross.

lyrics.stanza: The heavier the cross, the nearer God; No cross without, no God within! The prince of darkness thus is trod, Amid the world's false glare and din. Oh, happy he, with all his loss, Whom God hath set beneath the cross.

Thou Crucified! the cross I bear. The longer, may it dearer be; And lest I faint while ling'ring here, Implant Thou such a heart in me That faith and love may flourish e'er Till for the cross the crown I wear.
